title: 3DMGAME-7 Days To Die Alpha 7.9 Steam Edition Fixed AMT
description:
Reupload for PirateBay Original Torrent -

7 Days to Die is an open world, voxel-based, sandbox game that is a unique mash up of First Person Shooter, Survival Horror, Tower Defense and Role Playing Games combining combat, crafting, looting, mining, exploration, and character growth.

--==[ All credit goes to the Apocalypse Modding Team and the 3DM Team ]==--


AMT Added Features:

7DTD - Server Manager (by frontrunnertek)
7DTD - Editor (by HAL9000)
Custom Dedicated.ini & Startdedicated.bat for using SSE to host a server.
Removed ALT + TAB cycling you to a random game.


Special thanks to Shadow Doctor K for hooking up the torrent.
